00019 /* All the following functions use the mutual interaction principle (i.e. reciprocity). */

00024 /*** For debugging only: we check if the positions are too close for direct computation: ***/
00025 /* #define _CHECK_IF_POSITION_ARE_TOO_CLOSE_ */
00026 #ifdef _CHECK_IF_POSITION_ARE_TOO_CLOSE_
00027 #define CHECK_IF_POSITION_ARE_TOO_CLOSE(pos_x_tgt, pos_y_tgt, pos_z_tgt, pos_x_src, pos_y_src, pos_z_src) { \
00028   if (position_Are_too_close(pos_x_tgt, pos_y_tgt, pos_z_tgt, pos_x_src, pos_y_src, pos_z_src)){            \
00029     fprintf(f_output, "In file direct_computation.c: the two position are too close:\n");                   \
00030     pos_xyz_Display(pos_x_tgt, pos_y_tgt, pos_z_tgt, f_output, low);    \
00031     fprintf(f_output, "\t and \t");                                     \
00032     pos_xyz_Display(pos_x_src, pos_y_src, pos_z_src, f_output, low);    \
00033     fprintf(f_output, "\n");                                            \
00034     FMB_ERROR_BRIEF();                                                  \
00035   }                                                                     \
00036 }
00037 #else 
00038 #define CHECK_IF_POSITION_ARE_TOO_CLOSE(pos_x_tgt, pos_y_tgt, pos_z_tgt, pos_x_src, pos_y_src, pos_z_src) 
00039 #endif

00057 #ifdef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_
00058 
00059 void 
00060 bodies_Compute_own_interaction(bodies_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_b){
00061 
00062   bodies_ind_t i,j;
00063   bodies_ind_t n = bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b);
00064 
00065   FMB_CONST COORDINATES_T *FMB_RESTRICT p_px;
00066   FMB_CONST COORDINATES_T *FMB_RESTRICT p_py;
00067   FMB_CONST COORDINATES_T *FMB_RESTRICT p_pz;
00068   FMB_CONST VALUES_T *FMB_RESTRICT p_val;
00069   COORDINATES_T pix, piy, piz, pjx, pjy, pjz;
00070   VALUES_T val_i, val_j;
00071 
00072   COORDINATES_T *FMB_RESTRICT p_fx;
00073   COORDINATES_T *FMB_RESTRICT p_fy;
00074   COORDINATES_T *FMB_RESTRICT p_fz;
00075   COORDINATES_T fix, fiy, fiz;
00076 
00077   REAL_T eps_soft_square = FMB_Info.eps_soft_square;
00078 
00079   p_px = p_b->p_pos_x;
00080   p_py = p_b->p_pos_y;
00081   p_pz = p_b->p_pos_z;
00082 
00083   p_val = bodies_Get_p_value(p_b, 0);
00084   p_fx = p_b->p_fx;
00085   p_fy = p_b->p_fy;
00086   p_fz = p_b->p_fz;
00087 
00088   for(i=0; i<n-1; i++){
00089     pix = p_px[i];
00090     piy = p_py[i];
00091     piz = p_pz[i];
00092     val_i = p_val[i];
00093 
00094     fix = p_fx[i];
00095     fiy = p_fy[i];
00096     fiz = p_fz[i];
00097 
00098 
00099     for (j=i+1;  j<n;    j++){
00100       pjx = p_px[j];
00101       pjy = p_py[j];
00102       pjz = p_pz[j];
00103       val_j = p_val[j];
00104 
00105       CHECK_IF_POSITION_ARE_TOO_CLOSE(pix, piy, piz, pjx, pjy, pjz);       
00106       DIRECT_COMPUTATION_MUTUAL_SOFT(pix, piy, piz,
00107                                      pjx, pjy, pjz,
00108                                      val_i,
00109                                      val_j,
00110                                      fix, fiy, fiz,
00111                                      p_fx[j], p_fy[j], p_fz[j],
00112                                      pot_i,
00113                                      p_pot[j],
00114                                      eps_soft_square);
00115     }
00116 
00117     p_fx[i] = fix;    
00118     p_fy[i] = fiy;
00119     p_fz[i] = fiz;   
00120   }
00121 }
00122 
00123 #else /* #ifdef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_ */
00124 
00125 void 
00126 bodies_Compute_own_interaction(bodies_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_b){
00127 
00128   bodies_ind_t i,j;
00129   bodies_ind_t n = bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b);
00130 
00131   body_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_body_i;
00132   body_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_body_j;
00133 
00134   COORDINATES_T pix, piy, piz;
00135   COORDINATES_T pjx, pjy, pjz;
00136   VALUES_T val_i;
00137   position_t *p_force_vector_j;
00138   COORDINATES_T fix, fiy, fiz;
00139 
00140   REAL_T eps_soft_square = FMB_Info.eps_soft_square;
00141 
00142   p_body_i = p_b->p_bodies;
00143 
00144   for(i=0; i<n-1; i++){
00145     pix = POSITION_GET_X(body_Get_p_position(p_body_i));
00146     piy = POSITION_GET_Y(body_Get_p_position(p_body_i));
00147     piz = POSITION_GET_Z(body_Get_p_position(p_body_i));
00148     val_i = body_Get_value(p_body_i);
00149     fix = POSITION_GET_X(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_i));
00150     fiy = POSITION_GET_Y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_i));
00151     fiz = POSITION_GET_Z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_i));
00152 
00153     p_body_j = p_body_i;
00154 
00155     for (j=i+1;  j<n;    j++){
00156       ++p_body_j;
00157       pjx = POSITION_GET_X(body_Get_p_position(p_body_j));
00158       pjy = POSITION_GET_Y(body_Get_p_position(p_body_j));
00159       pjz = POSITION_GET_Z(body_Get_p_position(p_body_j));
00160       p_force_vector_j = body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_j);
00161 
00162       CHECK_IF_POSITION_ARE_TOO_CLOSE(pix, piy, piz, pjx, pjy, pjz); 
00163       DIRECT_COMPUTATION_MUTUAL_SOFT(pix, piy, piz,
00164                                      pjx, pjy, pjz,
00165                                      val_i,
00166                                      body_Get_value(p_body_j),
00167                                      fix, fiy, fiz,
00168                                      POSITION_GET_X(p_force_vector_j), 
00169                                      POSITION_GET_Y(p_force_vector_j), 
00170                                      POSITION_GET_Z(p_force_vector_j), 
00171                                      pot_i,
00172                                      BODY_GET_POTENTIAL(p_body_j),
00173                                      eps_soft_square);
00174     }
00175 
00176     position_Set_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_i), fix);
00177     position_Set_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_i), fiy);
00178     position_Set_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_i), fiz);
00179     ++p_body_i;
00180   }
00181 }
